entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove NewsstandKit Dependency to build targeting iOS17 #15660
  • Updating shell Tab title doesn't work via Hot Reload / code behind #15659
  • Oppo's system overrides the app's font and in place uses the system set font. #15654
  • Updating a ControlTemplate at runtime causes it to disappear. #15649
    Backlog
  • On Android, Maui Blazor app can't play HTML5 video when source comes from an IFileProvider #15647
    Backlog
  • Proposal for Enhanced Splash Screen Functionality in MAUI for iOS #15637
    Backlog
  • A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App My Recipes New_New Recipe_Usability: Disabled "Save" button is not looking like disabled. #15636
    .NET 8
  • A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App My Recipes New_New Recipe_Voiceover: After changing the value for review, voice over is not announcing new value its announcing incorrect rating value. #15634
    .NET 8
  • Label with Center or End horizontal alignment, and InputTransparency="true", sizes strangely #15633
    Backlog
  • A11y_.NETCore_RecipesAppMyRecipesNew_NewRecipe_Usability: Disabled "Save" button is not looking like disabled. #15628
    .NET 8
  • A11y_.NETCore_RecipesAppMyRecipesNew_NewRecipe_ScreenReader: Voice over is not announcing "Recipe Name" field as required field and not marked up with any chevron/symbol. #15627
    .NET 8
  • A11y_.NETCore_RecipesAppMyRecipesNew_NewRecipe_Usability: Disabled "Save" button is not looking like disabled. #15626
    .NET 8
  • A11y_.NETCore_RecipesAppMyRecipesNew_NewRecipe_ScreenReader: Talkback is not announcing "Recipe Name" field as required field and not marked up with any chevron/symbol. #15625
    .NET 8
  • A11y_.NETCore_RecipesAppMyRecipesEdit_EditRecipe_ScreenReader: Talkback is not announcing label information for slider, plus/minus button. #15623
    .NET 8
  • A11y_.NETCore_RecipesAppMyRecipesEdit_EditRecipe_ScreenReader: After changing the value for review, voice over is not announcing new value, it’s reading previous value. #15622
    .NET 8
  • A11y_.NETCore_RecipesAppMyRecipesEdit_EditRecipe_ScreenReader: Voice over is not announcing label information for slider, plus/minus button. #15621
    .NET 8

Closed

  • [Windows] Triggered VisualState only gets applied for a short time, then is undone #13837
    Backlog
  • ToolbarItem Icon Coloring inconsistent #9240
    .NET 8 Planning
  • FlyoutPage on iOS net8.0 opens Flyout extremely slowly #15552
  • Disconnecting a monitor in a multi monitor setup breaks Maui window if app window is hidden #15475
  • HorizontalOptions="FillAndExpand" is ignored in Android when a stack layout is inside a RefreshView #11879
    Backlog
  • Flexlayout into CollectionView crashes #12189
    Backlog
  • Windows deadlock when copying text in Entry #12369
  • .Net8 vs .Net7 #15619

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix events not firing for `Scrolled` and `RemainingItemsThresholdReached` #15658
    platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃, i/regression
  • [uitests] Run Control gallery tests with cake on iOS and Android #15657
    do-not-merge
  • [Handlers] Make sure to update Content on handlers when the ControlTemplate changes #15656
    community ✨
  • Fix DataTrigger behavior that can cause some strange inconsistencies #15655
    community ✨
  • [net7.0] Handle Grid * expansion when size is larger than minimum, but less than sufficient to display full size #15653
  • [net7.0] Make CollectionView on iOS measure to content size #15652
  • [net7.0] [macOS] Display alert by Window #15651
  • [net7.0] Catch InvalidProtocolBufferException creating EncryptedSharedPreferences #15650
  • [main] Updates to new released packages #15648
  • Bump Microsoft.JSInterop from 7.0.5 to 7.0.7 #15646
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authorization from 7.0.5 to 7.0.7 #15645
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web from 7.0.5 to 7.0.7 #15644
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Google from 7.0.5 to 7.0.7 #15643
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.MicrosoftAccount from 7.0.5 to 7.0.7 #15642
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump System.Text.Json from 7.0.2 to 7.0.3 #15641
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Facebook from 7.0.5 to 7.0.7 #15640
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.3.230502000 to 1.3.230602002 #15639
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView from 7.0.5 to 7.0.7 #15638
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Windows UI tests for CI #15629
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, area/testing
  • [iOS] Allow to remove the Image from Button #15624
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-button

Merged

  • [net8.0] Revert squash merge from main #15632
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Fix toolbar OverflowIcon color not getting properly set. #15612
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [ios] fix memory leak in Image #15062
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️
  • Fix typo on Resizetizer After.targets #15630
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8 #15478
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Include documentation section about OnSizeAllocated #15617
  • Add 8.0.0-preview.5.8529 to bug report issue template #15615
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨

Updated

  • Fix issues setting Shell TabBar appearance #15447
    t/bug, t/breaking 💥, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Fixed removing items from the shell causing a crash #15098
    area/shell 🐢
  • [Windows/macOS] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • [android] improve performance of `Entry.MaxLength` #15614
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️
  • Add SwipeItems to LogicalChildren #13864
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [X] Optimize OnPlatform element syntax #5611
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, .NET 8 Planning
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Android] Fix SwipeView not swiping using Label as direct content #14824
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Android: recreate activity on dark mode change #15449
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/theme
  • [iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse #14619
    community ✨
  • Hook up ScrollViewer event tracking in Windows CollectionView #15555
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [macOS] Implement IsEnabled property in MenuFlyoutItems #14920
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-contextmenu
  • [Android] Fix issue invoking ReturnCommand #14972
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures
  • [Windows] Implement ItemsUpdatingScrollMode on CollectionView #15601
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Windows] Fix CollectionView broken test #15584
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [iOS] Avoid crash setting custom icon in SearchHandler #14634
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Fix IsSpellCheckEnabled #15459
    area/controls 🎮
